author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.7.x-issue4k branch, reintegrated in r1167201.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3916 - Replace WSDL representation of interface contract with an internal representation for passing via the registry. Still not particularly happy with this but I have more confidence that it will work reliably when compared to serializing/deserializing WSDL. It would be preferable I think to represent the interface contract more generally as artifacts in the domain registry but that's for another day.

author: hwright
msg: Reintegrate the 1.7.x-issue4k branch:
Fix issue #4000 'WC-WC-copy of file external creates first-class file node'.
Branch:
^/subversion/branches/1.7.x-issue4k
Justification:
Inconsistency and regression. Copies file externals as "real" files
when recursively copying, and can create collisions between externals
definitions and versioned nodes, causing error on each checkout/update.
Notes:
- This fix depends on r1164027 (separately nominated) to cover file
externals that have seen a commit from the current WC -- otherwise
issue #4000 remains for committed file externals.
- r1164765 adds a test; it depends on r1164027 to pass.
Conflicts:
This group depends on the r1164027 group.
Votes:
+1: neels, philip, rhuijben
